plot: A model in L.A. has a very troubled and unlucky dating life. She tries to fake a British accent to impress a British man.
title: How to Bang a Brit
plot_es: A model in L.A. has a very troubled and unlucky dating life. She tries to fake a British accent to impress a British man.
plot_en: A model in L.A. has a very troubled and unlucky dating life. She tries to fake a British accent to impress a British man.
